\w and|strong="H3966"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w against|strong="H3966"\w* \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w borders|strong="H1379"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w and|strong="H3966"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1571"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* shrewd.

Zion’s Coming King (Matthew 21:1–11; Mark 11:1–11; Luke 19:28–40; John 12:12–19)

\w Rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*! \w Shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w triumph|strong="H7321"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*! \w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* comes \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w victorious|strong="H3467"\w*,\f + \fr 9:9 \ft Or righteous and endowed with salvation\f* \w humble|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w colt|strong="H5895"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w foal|strong="H5895"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*.\f + \fr 9:9 \ft Cited in Matthew 21:5 and John 12:15\f*

The LORD Will Save His People
